sentences.en: A statistician has to be something of a generalist.
But Mitchell aside, saying he was not a statistician.
sentences.cn: 但是米切尔置之不理, 并说他不是统计学家.

sentences.en: I am a statistician, a "cosine academic, " should you find the expression amusing.
sentences.cn: 我是一名统计学家，“余弦学者”，如果你觉得这个表达有趣的话。

sentences.en: Individuals vary, but remain constant . So says the statistician.
sentences.cn: 本性好异, 共性却是永久的,统计家们也是那样的讲法.

sentences.en: Laboratory administration is perfect, the member that set full - time laboratory director, engineering technology, statistician.
sentences.cn: 化验室治理机构健全, 设有 专职 化验室主任 、 工艺技术员 、 统计员.

sentences.en: Meet Sir Cecil Thistlethwaite, the celebrated theological statistician.
sentences.cn: 跟著名的神学统计员塞西铁苏思伟特先生会面.

sentences.en: The gig which requires the specialist to capture, sort, and figure out what data are relevant is one part statistician, one part forensic scientist, and one part hacker.
sentences.cn: 数据科学家们需要获取、分类整理并弄清哪些数据是有用的，他们需要同时扮演统计学家、鉴证专员以及黑客的角色。

sentences.en: The statistician diagrammed the statistical results.
sentences.cn: 统计员用图表来表示统计结果.

words.tran_cn: 统计；统计学；[统计] 统计资料
